card.name: Adamaro, First to Desire
card.text: Adamaro, First to Desire's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in the hand of the opponent with the most cards in hand.

card.text: Choose one - Tap all Spirits; or tap all non-Spirit creatures.

card.name: Akki Drillmaster
card.text: {T}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Akki Underling
card.text: As long as you have seven or more cards in hand, Akki Underling gets +2/+1 and has first strike.

card.name: Akuta, Born of Ash
card.text: Haste At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have more cards in hand than each opponent, you may sacrifice a Swamp. If you do, return Akuta, Born of Ash from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Arashi, the Sky Asunder

card.name: Ashes of the Fallen
card.text: As Ashes of the Fallen enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Each creature card in your graveyard has the chosen creature type in addition to its other types.

card.name: Ayumi, the Last Visitor
card.text: Legendary landwalk

card.name: Barrel Down Sokenzan
card.text: Sweep - Return any number of Mountains you control to their owner's hand. Barrel Down Sokenzan deals damage to target creature equal to twice the number of Mountains returned this way.

card.name: Blood Clock
card.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player returns a permanent he or she controls to its owner's hand unless he or she pays 2 life.

card.name: Bounteous Kirin
card.text: Flying Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may gain life equal to that spell's converted mana cost.

card.name: Burning-Eye Zubera
card.text: When Burning-Eye Zubera dies, if 4 or more damage was dealt to it this turn, Burning-Eye Zubera deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Captive Flame
card.text: {R}: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.text: Sweep - Return any number of Plains you control to their owner's hand. Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn for each Plains returned this way.

card.name: Choice of Damnations
card.text: Target opponent chooses a number. You may have that player lose that much life. If you don't, that player sacrifices all but that many permanents.

card.name: Cloudhoof Kirin
card.text: Flying Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may have target player put the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard, where X is that spell's converted mana cost.

card.name: Cowed by Wisdom
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block unless its controller pays {1} for each card in your hand.

card.name: Curtain of Light
card.text: Cast Curtain of Light only during combat after blockers are declared. Target unblocked attacking creature becomes blocked. Draw a card.

card.name: Cut the Earthly Bond
card.text: Return target enchanted permanent to its owner's hand.

card.name: Death Denied
card.text: Return X target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Death of a Thousand Stings
card.text: Target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have more cards in hand than each opponent, you may return Death of a Thousand Stings from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Dense Canopy
card.text: Creatures with flying can block only creatures with flying.

card.name: Descendant of Masumaro
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on Descendant of Masumaro for each card in your hand, then remove a +1/+1 counter from Descendant of Masumaro for each card in target opponent's hand.

card.name: Descendant of Soramaro
card.text: {1}{U}: Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of cards in your hand, then put them back in any order.

card.name: Dosan's Oldest Chant

card.text: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may sacrifice Dreamcatcher. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Eiganjo Free-Riders
